description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1t5479E6bdvFs4E7]{Talisman Dabbler Dedication}

You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known. Normally, affixing more than one talisman to an item causes the talismans to be suppressed, but when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{Affix a Talisman}, you can specially treat one item youâ€™re working on, allowing it to have two active talismans at once.

This special treatment ends if you use Affix a Talisman to treat a new item for this ability.
